title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Honolulu, HI, USA
description:
Come join us on November 15th for the Global Day of Coderetreat in Honolulu :) 
RSVP at http://www.meetup.com/aloharb/events/215199322/ 
This event is language agnostic (not just ruby!) and intended for intermediate to advanced developers of any language looking to improve their level of software development & design.
